summary: NAR 06/19/2003.  *MR   AFTER FOLLOWING THE OWNERS  MANUAL GUIDELINES IN TRANSPORTING TRAILERS ON FORD VEHICLES.  THE CONSUMER TOWED THE TRAILER, AND   THE  VEHICLE SLIPPED INTO NEUTRAL. THE CONSUMERS WAS UNABLE TO RESTART THE VEHICLE. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED AND THE MECHANIC DETERMINED THE TRANSMISSION HAD BURNED OUT BECAUSE THE VEHICLE WAS IN OVERDRIVE.  *JB
